lines.text: Me, I ride for me.
Cru, just pretend you're in the lumber yard... go balls out.
Late again huh Cru?
Oh, excuse me blob, I don't have a watch.
Bob, the name's Bob, not Blob. Smart-ass.
They're getting a boy to do a man's job.
Now that we're official, you think we have room for one more on the Rad team?
There's your fantasy, studly.
Me and Katie are like... special.

[Luke and Becky]
ooh... special love
And Hollywood Mike Miranda makes his second dramatic exit of the day.
*This*... is ass-sliding.

[after being hit by a newspaper thrown by Cru and spilling his coffee]
This world would be a lot better off without kids!

[Luke and Becky are walking down the hall together, arm in arm]
C'mon, its so obvious from the moment you seem them together
I know but they've never copped to it like that before.
Well they probably just didn't want you to feel left out.
Ya? So what's changed?
God, what I wouldn't give to go ass-sliding with you right now.

[after wipes out trying to backflip]
you over-rotated.
NO SHIT
